verses.verse: Canst thou draw <S%H4900>out<s%> <S%H3882>leviathan<s%> with a <S%H2443>hook?<s%> or his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> with a <S%H2256>cord<s%> which thou lettest <S%H8257>down?<s%>
Canst thou <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H100>hook<s%> into his <S%H639>nose?<s%> or <S%H5344>bore<s%> his <S%H3895>jaw<s%> through with a <S%H2336>thorn?<s%>
Will he make <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H8469>supplications<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee? will he <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7390>soft<s%> words <S%H413>unto<s%> thee?
Will he <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee? wilt thou <S%H3947>take<s%> him for a <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5769>forever?<s%>
Wilt thou <S%H7832>play<s%> with him as with a <S%H6833>bird?<s%> or wilt thou <S%H7194>bind<s%> him for thy <S%H5291>maidens?<s%>
Shall the <S%H2271>companions<s%> make a <S%H3738>banquet<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> him? shall they <S%H2673>part<s%> him <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H3669>merchants?<s%>
Canst thou <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H5785>skin<s%> with barbed <S%H7905>irons?<s%> or his <S%H7218>head<s%> with <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H6767>spears?<s%>
Lay <S%H7760><s%> thine <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> do <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H3254>more.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the <S%H8431>hope<s%> of him is in <S%H3576>vain:<s%> shall not one be cast <S%H2904>down<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H4758>sight<s%> of him?
None <S%H3808><s%> is so <S%H393>fierce<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> dare stir him <S%H5782>up:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> then is able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me?
Who <S%H4310><s%> hath <S%H6923>prevented<s%> me, that I should <S%H7999>repay<s%> him? whatsoever is <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> is mine.
I will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2790>conceal<s%> his <S%H905>parts,<s%> <S%H1697>nor<s%> his <S%H1369>power,<s%> nor his <S%H2433>comely<s%> <S%H6187>proportion.<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H1540>discover<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of his <S%H3830>garment?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> to him with his <S%H3718>double<s%> <S%H7448>bridle?<s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can <S%H6605>open<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of his <S%H6440>face?<s%> his <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H367>terrible<s%> round <S%H5439>about.<s%>
His <S%H650>scales<s%> <S%H4043><s%> are his <S%H1346>pride,<s%> shut up <S%H5462>together<s%> as with a <S%H6862>close<s%> <S%H2368>seal.<s%>
One <S%H259><s%> is so <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H259>another,<s%> that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>air<s%> can <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.
They are <S%H1692>joined<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> they stick <S%H3920>together,<s%> that they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H6504>sundered.<s%>
By his <S%H5846>sneezes<s%> a <S%H216>light<s%> doth <S%H1984>shine,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are like the <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> of the <S%H7837>morning.<s%>
Out of his <S%H4480>mouth<s%> <S%H6310><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> burning <S%H3940>lamps,<s%> and <S%H3590>sparks<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> leap <S%H4422>out.<s%>
Out of his <S%H4480>nostrils<s%> <S%H5156><s%> <S%H3318>goeth<s%> <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> as out of a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H1731>pot<s%> or <S%H100>caldron.<s%>
His <S%H5315>breath<s%> <S%H3857>kindleth<s%> <S%H1513>coals,<s%> and a <S%H3851>flame<s%> goeth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4480>mouth.<s%> <S%H6310><s%>
In his <S%H6677>neck<s%> <S%H3885>remaineth<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> and <S%H1670>sorrow<s%> is turned into <S%H1750>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.
The <S%H4651>flakes<s%> of his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> are joined <S%H1692>together:<s%> they are <S%H3332>firm<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> themselves; they <S%H1077>cannot<s%> be <S%H4131>moved.<s%>
His <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H3332>firm<s%> <S%H3644>as<s%> a <S%H68>stone;<s%> yea, as <S%H3332>hard<s%> as a <S%H6400>piece<s%> of the <S%H8482>nether<s%> millstone.
When he raiseth <S%H4480>up<s%> <S%H7613><s%> himself, the <S%H410>mighty<s%> are <S%H1481>afraid:<s%> by reason of <S%H4480>breakings<s%> <S%H7667><s%> they purify <S%H2398>themselves.<s%>
The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of him that <S%H5381>layeth<s%> at him <S%H1097>cannot<s%> <S%H6965>hold:<s%> the <S%H2595>spear,<s%> the <S%H4551>dart,<s%> nor the <S%H8302>habergeon.<s%>
He <S%H2803>esteemeth<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> as <S%H8401>straw,<s%> and <S%H5154>brass<s%> as <S%H7539>rotten<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
The <S%H1121>arrow<s%> <S%H7198><s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> make him <S%H1272>flee:<s%> <S%H68>slingstones<s%> <S%H7050><s%> are <S%H2015>turned<s%> with him into <S%H7179>stubble.<s%>
Darts <S%H8455><s%> are <S%H2803>counted<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble:<s%> he <S%H7832>laugheth<s%> at the <S%H7494>shaking<s%> of a <S%H3591>spear.<s%>
Sharp <S%H2303><s%> <S%H2789>stones<s%> are <S%H8478>under<s%> him: he <S%H7502>spreadeth<s%> sharp pointed <S%H2742>things<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H2916>mire.<s%>
He maketh the <S%H4688>deep<s%> to <S%H7570>boil<s%> like a <S%H5518>pot:<s%> he <S%H7760>maketh<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> like a pot of <S%H4841>ointment.<s%>
He maketh a <S%H5410>path<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him; one would <S%H2803>think<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> to be <S%H7872>hoary.<s%>
Upon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6083>earth<s%> there is <S%H369>not<s%> his <S%H4915>like,<s%> who is <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H2844>fear.<s%>

He <S%H7200>beholdeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> things: <S%H1931>he<s%> is a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7830>pride.<s%>
